pages.body:
Here is what I did for my headless Ubuntu 19.04 server.

__Optional / Recommended__ Install & Configure [[fail2ban]]

## Install TOR to enable functionality with zeronet.  [Source](https://www.linuxuprising.com/2018/10/how-to-install-and-use-tor-as-proxy-in.html)

 - Start by installing apt-transport-https, needed in order to use https repositories, and curl, to download the repository key:

`sudo apt install tor tor-geoipdb torsocks`

### Prepare TOR to work with Zeronet,  [Source](https://zeronet.readthedocs.io/en/latest/faq/#how-to-use-zeronet-with-tor)

 - Open up your /etc/tor/torrc file with

`sudo nano /etc/tor/torrc`

 - Remove the # character from lines `ControlPort 9051` and `CookieAuthentication 1` (line ~57)
    
 - Restart tor, then add permission for yourself to read the auth cookie. With Debian Linux, 

`sudo usermod -a -G debian-tor [yourlinuxuser]`

(be sure to replace [yourlinuxuser] appropriately.)
 - Logout/Login with your user to apply group changes

Tip: You can verify if your Tor setup is running correctly using
`echo 'PROTOCOLINFO' | nc 127.0.0.1 9051`

### Install Zeronet for Debian Linux,  [Source](https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet/tree/py3#other-platforms-install-from-source)

`sudo apt-get update`

`wget https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet-linux/archive/dist-linux64/ZeroNet-py3-linux64.tar.gz`

`tar xvpfz ZeroNet-py3-linux64.tar.gz`
	
### Enable the Bootstrapper and UIPassword plugins and launch Zeronet

`cd ZeroNet-linux-dist-linux64/`

`cd core`

`cd plugins`

`mv disabled-UiPassword UiPassword`

`mv disabled-Bootstrapper Bootstrapper`

`mv Trayicon disabled-Trayicon`

`cd ..`

`cd ..`

`nohup ./ZeroNet.sh --ui_ip '*' --ui_port 80 --ui_password mypassword`

 - Now you can close your terminal and open your browser to the ip address of your server to see the WebUI.

Notes: 
(ui_ip tells the client to bind the UI to any ip)
(ui_port) being set to 80 is the default port for your browser, you can change it but then you will need to specify the port with the address such as `http://ServerIP:43110` with 43110 being the identified port for the WebUI
(ui_password) this is the password used for your WebUI

## Happy ZeroBoxing!

- - - -

Tutorial with additional steps: [How to Install and run Zeronet on any Linux server like Raspberry Pi (zeronet seedbox, public proxy)](/16Go5kc2U9Ff4jeaY8kYiDEgpMYdgyboPY/?Topic:2_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS/How+to+Install+and+run+Zeronet+on+a+Raspberry+Pi+or+any+Linux+computer)

# List of Zites: Services | [[zite-list-services-talk|Talk]]

### Sites that provide some sort of utility to the visitor can be classified as a 'Service' site

**[I2P+](http://127.0.0.1:43110/18UDHQbfX1A388SKvPHxXB1ZGFu9uRy1Kh/).**
I2P+ is an enhanced version of Java I2P that aims to deliver a superior user experience. Updated themes, easier to understand configuration and diagnostics, and an enhanced feature set make I2P+ a compelling alternative to the official I2P release. Additionally, I2P+ implements improvements to the router's network performance and, for routers that are firewalled, significantly increases participating traffic and network responsiveness.
 * Zite Address:   18UDHQbfX1A388SKvPHxXB1ZGFu9uRy1Kh
 * Zite Discussion: [0List](http://127.0.0.1:43110/186THqMWuptrZxq1rxzpguAivK3Bs6z84o/?Topic:1558540428_1HvtaEP4h88QTu4Pv1a7SDuq1H6v7TDgsN), [ZeroMe](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Me.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Profile/1MoonP8t4rk9QamBUPh5Aspkwa1Xhf5ux2/1HvtaEP4h88QTu4Pv1a7SDuq1H6v7TDgsN/i2plus@zeroid.bit)

**[CodeR](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1CodEr7T9xNXSPcwbsvf5fHTqsixDMwDzL/).**  
CodeR is a JSFiddle (CodePen) for [[ZeroNet]]. It offers public codes, syntax highlighting, big list of libraries and transpilers: Babel, CoffeeScript, LiveScript, SASS, LESS.
  * Zite Address:   1CodEr7T9xNXSPcwbsvf5fHTqsixDMwDzL

**[Nullpaste](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1MgHVPCE1ve6QfKrgsqCURzRj72HrRWioz/).**  
Nullpaste is a version of Pastebin for [[ZeroNet]]. The zite offers both public and private publishing, syntax highlighting, and the ability to view recent pastes.  
  * Zite Address:   1MgHVPCE1ve6QfKrgsqCURzRj72HrRWioz  
  * Zite Discussion: [0List](http://127.0.0.1:43110/0list.bit/?Topic:1_16Szsy1UtjiXpEevWVdUDrNfNTAZ9PLbcY/NullPaste+Decentralized+pastebin+with+code+highlighting+encryption), ZeroCentral  
  * Zite Domain: 0pastebin.bit (unconfirmed)  

**[Authentication : ZeroID](http://127.0.0.1:43110/zeroid.bit/).**  
ZeroID is used as an authentication service for username ID's Obtaining a alias from this service will allow visitors to post comments on the various zites available on Zeronet.
  * Zite Address:   1iD5ZQJMNXu43w1qLB8sfdHVKppVMduGz  
  * Zite Discussion: 0List, ZeroCentral  
  * Zite Domain: zeroid.bit  

**[ZeroMail](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Mail.ZeroNetwork.bit/).**  
ZeroMail is ZeroNet's version of a mail client. ZeroMail allows visitors with a registered ZeroID username to send encrypted messages to other users who have a ZeroID username. The ZeroMail system can not be used to send email to external email addresses.  
  * Zite Address:  	1MaiL5gfBM1cyb4a8e3iiL8L5gXmoAJu27  
  * Zite Discussion: 0List, ZeroCentral, [ZeroTalk](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:10_1MxdAjWgnqwCaunGHmhY39tVR51qV3peJL/ZeroMail+support+thread)  
  * Zite Domain: Mail.ZeroNetwork.bit  

**[ZeroPolls](http://127.0.0.1:43110/ZeroPolls.bit/).**  
ZeroPolls is a polling platform that allows visitors with an assigned ZeroID to post and vote on polls. Results can be viewed after a vote is submitted and comments can be posted by clicking on the poll's title. **Be advised that there is a small chance that an attacker could discover your votes associated with your ZeroID with a bit of effort.**  
  * Zite Address:   1K28kQFMquNzto2iQf4GGjr6oFUbC1NddE  
  * Zite Discussion: 
[0List](http://127.0.0.1:43110/0list.bit/?Topic:1_1Mk5sVKeCrwMc3wSD11jM7DZTiqF5D9BaD/ZeroPolls), 
[ZeroCentral](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Dt7FR5aNLkqAjmosWh8cMWzJu633GYN6u/?Topic:4_1PvAyLAB5H1JKbiFjx95ZJXrNJVyWxs5Hf/ZeroPolls), ZeroTalk  
  * Zite Domain: ZeroPolls.bit  

**[ZeroProxies](http://127.0.0.1:43110/14y3fN1A214HYdKe5f6WnQdfT3PdKLSAJo/).**  
ZeroProxies is a site that contains a list of Zeronet proxy sites. These proxy sites allows visitors of the regular internet to be able to view a ZeroNet zite without installing or running the Zeronet client engine. Due to the portal being provided by a proxy, functionality can be limited.  
  * Zite Address:   14y3fN1A214HYdKe5f6WnQdfT3PdKLSAJo  
  * Zite Discussion: 
0List, 
ZeroCentral, 
[ZeroTalk](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:1_1ArMJqDaBJqeJ4MX3VqSnkfwkHe23PtLrW/Running+a+ZeroProxy)  
  * Zite Domain: 0proxy.bit, 0proxies.bit, zeroproxy.bit, zeroproxies.bit  

**[ZeroQuotes](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1NJyPoPpL8At17T6G7A1qHVQdqZDBmXcLT).**  
ZeroQuotes is a platform that features Quotes submitted by visitors. The site allows visitors to vote on the quotes that they enjoy.  
  * Zite Address:   1NJyPoPpL8At17T6G7A1qHVQdqZDBmXcLT  
  * Zite Discussion: 
[0List](http://127.0.0.1:43110/0list.bit/?Topic:81_1M5ztUWkCMP5Pv7MjwApWT7CNvWimGFaFa/ZeroQuotes), 
[ZeroCentral](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Dt7FR5aNLkqAjmosWh8cMWzJu633GYN6u/?Topic:81_1M5ztUWkCMP5Pv7MjwApWT7CNvWimGFaFa/ZeroQuotes), ZeroTalk  
  * Zite Domain: n/a  

**[ZeroTODOs](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1B8LmXYHzMGZzcRWoidAQb5SmKSyfjN63f).**  
ZeroTODO's is a platform that allows visitors to create tasks and checklists and organize activity in a planner style.  
  * Zite Address:   1B8LmXYHzMGZzcRWoidAQb5SmKSyfjN63f  
  * Zite Discussion: 
[0List](http://127.0.0.1:43110/0list.bit/?Topic:100_1M5ztUWkCMP5Pv7MjwApWT7CNvWimGFaFa/ZeroTodos), 
ZeroCentral, ZeroTalk  
  * Zite Domain: n/a  

**[Authentication : ZeroVerse](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1HPgDoReCFtE9qy71hnp55ksBVvV1gHJLQ).**  
ZeroVerse is an alternative platform to ZeroID, While operating in a similar way, the service will eventually be accepted in multiple places that accept ZeroID usernames.  
  * Zite Address:   1HPgDoReCFtE9qy71hnp55ksBVvV1gHJLQ  
  * Zite Discussion: 
0List, ZeroCentral, 
[ZeroTalk](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:4_1H8oKiRa7fGgUqS1hpUtaSYLvAqkaknbkf/yourID+ZeroVerse+bit+make+yourself+another+ZeroID)  
  * Zite Domain: zeroverse.bit  

**[QR Generator](http://127.0.0.1:43110/qrgen.bit/).**  
QR Generator creates QR codes instantly.   
  * Zite Address:   1NQhJp2DNAXwLUE6eFLVx7jnmBMEy3NJbo 
  * Zite Discussion: 
  * Zite Domain: qrgen.bit

**[IPFS crypto-addresses sharing](http://127.0.0.1:43110/17P4SJ1AsARbrj6naYbmAa7eSYCyr4UyJv/)**
  * Random
  * eLearning
  * Documentaries
  * Tutorials
  * Static HTML, eBooks
  * Applications ( GNU - Linux , Windows , MacOS , etc )
  * Movies, Series
  * Music
  * Sorted by years

**[zeroMaps](/1yUji4qPD7GAog8XkP3EDMEfrL995S4Xd/)**
   - Map of the Earth planet

**[git over ZeroNet](/1xxooZ7s8iDz3u56i5mNQ1XGmwF8Zvnw9/)**

**[Carnival Classifieds](/1ADVERTvh1AC7XhDBBkaEhL5wGkMuS9fwt)**
Carnival Classifieds let's you publish ads about your services and goods.

# Proxies

A proxy is a website that you can reach using any web-capable device that runs a multi-user [[ZeroNet]] instance. *[Learn how to host one](/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:1524212586_19H2XXg8jU9v8JstBejNbfAEaBNtMHgrtS#comment_220_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS)*. You can also install [[AWS Shadow Socks]].

There also is a website dedicated to listing proxies: [zeroproxies.bit](/zeroproxies.bit), but it is outdated.

File-Sharing sites
=======
Below is a collection of the various file-sharing sites found around ZeroNet. If you don't see one listed here please add it.

__NOTE__: If you intend to share files, please [[pin]] the file so that your zeronet client will not automatically remove it over time.


**Books :**
   * [AntiLibrary](/Antilibrary.bit/): Book catalogs that are separated by languages.
   * [ZeroPub](/zeropub.bit/)
   * [zbookdb](/zbookdb.bit/): A small site that releases five ebooks every week.


**Files :**
   * [BinChan's 0-Share](/1Dphm8Mth9WYN9fPm1yxj8Y4WhcKRhYXJJ/): Similar to ZeroUP.
   * [Intergalactic File Server ](/12MVkvYGcRW6u2NYbpfwVad1oQeyG4s9Er): IFS is a site that allows users to share a wide varity of files. Can also use IFServer.bit
   * [ZeroUP](/1uPLoaDwKzP6MCGoVzw48r4pxawRBdmQc/): File hosting with a file type and size restriction (10MB - 200MB) (popular)
   * [ZeroUP Unlimited](/1CiXRY9ATZSoZqBzwMfXEMsKtPRt2aQoF2/): ZeroUP clone that allows files up to 1GB.

**Important Files :**
   * [Manually Maintained Directories](/15Pf9VVuDT8NSWj1qUBh4V89yPmrmzRw6a/)

**Magnet Links :**
   * [Box-HD](/BoxHD.bit): HD TV Series Box Sets delivered in a 'Play' style UI
   * [KickAssTorrent (KAT)](/1LBr1dHoXvJAMjDgW8Wcg5kbCoKyJnzo6p/): KAT in pre alpha version
   * [Play+](/1J3JSAxiM3uhpkp2dymY59yud8r2RGW6MA/)
   * [Play Anime](/1AnimePihDhcbVdK1nvnbSEtH4oKU8RAYG/): A wide selection of titles from the Anime genre.
   * [Play Movies](/1PLAYgDQboKojowD3kwdb3CtWmWaokXvfp/): A wide selection of titles of various classic genres

## Open Source Sovereign Brexit, Distributed Democracy on Web 3. (Social Media)

[[ZeroWiki]] is a wiki platform for [[ZeroNet]], the distributed web network based on [[Bittorrent]], [[Bitcoin]] and [[Tor]]. 

[[ZeroWiki]] is public, [[cloning|clonable]]. Wikis can be used for taking notes, storing snippets, sharing knowledge by creating [[FAQ]]s and documentations, keeping track of your goals, or as simple to-do lists. See the [[help|help page]] for a more in-depth view of how it works. ZeroWiki solves the huge problem which wikipedia has, namely, that wikipedia is controlled by deletion-trolls and brainwashed scum admins.

# Proxies

A proxy is a website that you can reach using any web-capable device that runs a multi-user [[ZeroNet]] instance. *[Learn how to host one](/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:1524212586_19H2XXg8jU9v8JstBejNbfAEaBNtMHgrtS#comment_220_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS)*. You can also install [[AWS Shadow Socks]].

There also is a website dedicated to listing proxies: [zeroproxies.bit](/zeroproxies.bit), but it is outdated.

# List of Zites: Media | [[zite-list-media-talk|Talk]]

### Zites that provide media including movies, music, applications, books, can be considered media zites.

[peer-to-peer]: [[peer-to-peer]]

**[Microsoft MSDN Software Archive](/1AJB5rtjfB9imjDGVk5vtRtZp3zgYizbpG/).**  
This archive is a collection of MSDN Software taken from the Microsoft site, This zite uses Mega.nz links to provide content to visitors.  
  * Zite Address:   1AJB5rtjfB9imjDGVk5vtRtZp3zgYizbpG  
  * Zite Discussion: [0List](/0list.bit/?Topic:6_1BDapygZHNG8GxEuSsEpK9Xipm9mFfW1F2/isolinks+Official+Microsoft+MSDN+Software), ZeroCentral, ZeroTalk  
  * Zite Domain: n/a  

**[Play Torrents](/1PLAYgDQboKojowD3kwdb3CtWmWaokXvfp/).**  
Play Torrents is a zite that combines a beautiful user interface with move releases sourced from RARBG. The zite provides color coded ratings, movie trailers, and magnet links of various qualities. **Be aware that magnet links operate off of the [peer-to-peer] swarm and downloading media through this zite is just as easily monitored as The Pirate Bay**  
  * Zite Address:   1PLAYgDQboKojowD3kwdb3CtWmWaokXvfp  
  * Zite Discussion: 0List, ZeroCentral, ZeroTalk  
  * Zite Domain: playmovies.bit (unconfirmed)

**[ZeroTorrent.bit](/192dZ1EG5tU7PnCfuwGMDEBrr2eLqvs4t3).**  
ZeroTorrent is a file-sharing zite that works off of the ZeroTalk platform. The zite allows any visitor with a ZeroID to publish links to magnet files, post comments, cast votes, and also provides categories and a search feature. **Be aware that magnet links operate off of the [peer-to-peer] swarm and downloading media through this zite is just as easily monitored as The Pirate Bay**  
  * Zite Address:   192dZ1EG5tU7PnCfuwGMDEBrr2eLqvs4t3  
  * Zite Discussion: [0List](/0list.bit/?Topic:44_1M5ztUWkCMP5Pv7MjwApWT7CNvWimGFaFa/ZeroTorrent), 
[ZeroCentral](/1Dt7FR5aNLkqAjmosWh8cMWzJu633GYN6u/?Topic:3_1HcK5Hw1rPZeYdgTmqJGrVG2tSyR9Ke2Gt/ZeroTorrent), 
ZeroTalk  
  * Zite Domain: ZeroTorrent.bit

**[TVEpisodes.bit](http://127.0.0.1:43110/tvepisodes.bit/)**
Most recent TV episodes downloadable via torrent

**[NullFolder : To download and upload the files via BitTorrent trackers](/1GrtBsG57kjU2Z3iAQebG9D5c8CRDRLoPj/files.html)**

**[Fastcast](/1GMsFaG1qro55py9HYsjCwAtt1tHbBRbwH)**
- Media player
- Media content sharing

**[NinjaBeats](/15F9LYs6c17NUXv3MxpJSGbpWxyHTEbzMk).**  
**NinjaBeats is a work-in-progress decentralised music streaming service** with a well-defined dynamic user interface. Users can upload any kind of multimedia and share content uploaded by others in real-time using the [NinjaBeats streamer](/15F9LYs6c17NUXv3MxpJSGbpWxyHTEbzMk/stream/audio.html).

On launch day, NinjaBeats plans on releasing its huge 300GB collection of lossless, "perfectly tagged" music accessible on the streamer. The site's homepage currently displays info on the plans and progress of the project, and additionally discusses how it attempts to remain ethical and legal.
  * Zite Address:   15F9LYs6c17NUXv3MxpJSGbpWxyHTEbzMk
  * Zite Discussion: 
[0List](/0list.bit/?Topic:1_12EgeG4vgNHzuPJYZqVJQwy2W9vkywbQQu/NinjaBeats),
ZeroCentral, 
ZeroTalk,  [ZeroMe](/Me.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Profile/1RedkCkVaXuVXrqCMpoXQS29bwaqsuFdL/12EgeG4vgNHzuPJYZqVJQwy2W9vkywbQQu/paintninja@zeroid.bit)
  * Zite Domain: 

**[KopyKate Big](/18Pfr2oswXvD352BbJvo59gZ3GbdbipSzh)** 
Video streaming

**[KxoVid](/14c5LUN73J7KKMznp9LvZWkxpZFWgE1sDz/?/categories)**
Video streaming. (need to download categories to see videos)

**[UA реліз](/1UkrrSpnJmuiig6r5v88Kn3isaR64Fbh3)**
Video indexing site allowing all users to contribute, link to external torrent sites, youtube. Search and commenting.

**[ZeroLSTN](/1MQveQ3RPpimXX2wjW2geAGkNJ1GdXkvJ3)**
